title: Watch out - scammers are impersonating DHL and DPD this Black Friday
description: Delivery scams looks to capitalize on Black Friday and holiday season shopping.

title: Millions of Android devices at risk of attack due to Arm Mali GPU driver flaws
description: Some phone makers are yet to distribute the patch, despite a fix being available for some time.

title: 3D NAND sales plummet across the globe as demand falls
description: Demand for 3D NAND memory plummeted in recent months, TrendForce says.

title: This fake MSI Afterburner is going after gamers' passwords
description: Gamers and power users also see their GPU power hijacked for crypto mining purposes.

title: This Roblox Chrome extension had a sneaky security backdoor
description: It's unclear if the devs did it on purpose, or if the extension was compromised in the meantime.

title: The US military is going all-in on zero-trust
description: DoD and its departments need to adopt Zero Trust by 2027, new paper says.

title: It's official - Kubernetes has never been more popular
description: Kubernetes deployment is reportedly more widespread than ever, though security concerns remain.

title: Amazon Echo smart speakers are their cheapest ever for Black Friday
description: Black Friday 2022 is the perfect time to buy a new Amazon Echo device – and there are plenty of deals going around.

title: Most of us really want to start delegating work tasks to AI already
description: New research claims most workers are more than willing to share their workload with artificial intelligence.

title: Digital transformation could be at risk from developer burnout
description: We’re all feeling the pressure, but developers may be among the hardest hit as the workload continues to grow.

title: Hackers take down EU Parliament site in apparent DDoS attack
description: Pro-Russian attackers retaliate to EU Parliament's call for further isolation of their country.

title: Nvidia RTX 4080 GPU is teaching scalpers a well-deserved lesson
description: Finally, some good news with the RTX 4080 graphics card – it’s killing the profits of scalpers on eBay.

title: The Samsung Galaxy S23 could have satellite communications and a super bright screen
description: Reports suggest Samsung will offer satellite communications on the S23 line, and the S23 Ultra will have a brighter screen.

title: Yamaha's new headphones promise ultra-clear sound (for a mind-blowing price)
description: New YH-5000SE over-ears feature much-missed planar magnetic tech, but come with an eye-watering $5,700 asking price.

title: Amazon Black Friday deals live: millions of discounts to launch at 12:01 PST tonight
description: Join us for our live coverage of the Amazon Black Friday sale, including all the best early deals - and a heads-up on upcoming offers.

title: Venmo update helps you spread the holiday cheer via new charity section
description: Coming to both iOS and Android, Venmo is also redesigning payment screens for easier transactions.
